status.title: Status meaning
status.privateOfficeURL: Dear users!  You can check out results of provided services in your personal account.
status.create: "The request created" means that your request has been successfully registered on the Portal.
status.send: "The request sent" means that your request has been successfully sent to governmental agency.
status.approved: "The request is received by a public authority" - means that the request is received by a public authority and you will get the answer at the earliest possible time.
status.inProcess: "Request in the processing" - means that the public agency has started processing the application.
status.completed: "The request is processed positively" - it means that you can use the result.
status.serviceFail: "The request is not processed" - it means that the public authority service is temporarily unavailable, or there was a technical error. Please try your request later.
status.waiting_for_payment: "Waiting for payment" - this status means that you need to make a payment or your payment is in process.
status.CREATED: "The request created" means that your request has been successfully registered on the "e-government" Portal.
status.ACCEPTED: The request is received by a public authority: This status means that the public agency has received a request.
status.REJECTED: "Request is rejected by a public authority": This status means that the public authority received a request. Request was denied due to improperly filled data.
status.APPROVED: "The request is processed positively": This status means that the public authority has made the request processing. Service rendering results are positive.
status.DECLINED: "The request is processed negatively": This status means that the public authority has made the request processing. Service rendering results are negative.
status.PROCESSED: "The request is processed": This status means that the public authority has made the request processing. Along with this status, the  public authority will send business data with the result of services providing, signed by EDS.
status.IN_PROCESSING: "Request processing": This status means that your request is being processed.
status.PREPARING_REQUEST: "Request processing": This status means that your request is being processed.
status.TECH_ERROR: "Technical error" means that there was a technical error.
status.PAID: "Paid": This status indicates that the payment has been successfully implemented through the e - government payment gateway. The electronic check is formed.
status.GO_TO_PAYMENT_STEP: "Waiting for payment": This status means that you need to make a payment.
status.WAITING_FOR_PAYMENT: "Waiting for payment": This status means that you need to make a payment.
status.NOT_PAID: "Not paid": This status means that payments has not been made.
status.TIME_OUT_PAY_ORDER: "Payment time expired": This status means that the term of payment waiting  has expired for account-order.
status.ON_APPROVAL: "The request is on the coordination": This status means that the coordination from the other participants of the process is required.
status.WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL: "Waiting for the coordination": this status means that your approval as from the process participant is required.
status.WAITING_FOR_MOBILE_SIGNING: "Waiting for signing by MEDS": this status means that you need to sign a document using a mobile electronic digital signature.
status.AGREED: "Agreed": This status indicates that everyone involved into the coordination gave a positive response.
status.CANCELLED: "Coordination is rejected" - this status means that one or more participants gave their refusal.
status.IN_QUEUE: "In queue" - this status means that the applicant is in queue.
status.SENDING: "Запрос отправляется" - означает, что ваш запрос отправлен и скоро будет получен государственным органом.

help.title: Help
help.mess: Cadastral number – unique number of real estate, given after registration. Cadastral number of lot of land looks like АА:ВВ:ССРРLL:КК, where АА — cadasrtal district. ВВ — cadastral region. ССРРLL — cadasrtal block. КК — number of lot of land.

vin.mess: "VIN-код" field is specified in the technical passport of vehicle in the шанақ/кузов/body line.< br > Please be specially careful when filling the "VIN-code" field. In case of mistake addmission when VIN-code entering, funds will be credited to the Tax Committee according to  VIN-code specified by taxpayer.
